Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can identify the problem as communicating over long distances.
The student can design a device (like a string telephone) that solves the problem using sound.
The student can show in the drawing how the device (string telephone) uses sound to communicate between two students.
The student can include in the drawing two students using the string telephone to show communication over distance.
The student can depict how the device sends and receives information effectively between the two students.
The student can illustrate that the device is built using only provided materials.
